person.persName: Thomas Kerr Ricketts (Maysville (Mason County) saddler and harness maker)

body.p: Residence: Maysville, Mason County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born saddle and harness maker. Married to Violet. Father of Jason Mason Ricketts and Thomas Kerr Ricketts.
